<br />

The objective of this five-day training course, co-organized by the 
[FRB-CESAB](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/about-the-foundation/le-cesab/)
and the
[GdR EcoStat](https://sites.google.com/site/gdrecostat/), 
is to train young researchers in reproducibility, software development and 
version management tools (e.g. `Git`, `GitHub`, `R Markdown`, `Quarto`, `renv`, `Docker`), 
applied to biodiversity research.



**N.B.** This training course is **in French**, but some slides are available in English in the tab `Courses/`.



<br />

## Prerequisites

Please follow this [tutorial](https://frbcesab.github.io/training-courses/installation.html) to install your working environment **before** attending the training course.

You also need to create an account on [GitHub](https://github.com/signup).
